description: Detects the use of Windows Credential Editor (WCE)
false_positives: Another service that uses a single -s command line switch
name: Windows Credential Editor
query: (((winlog.event_data.Imphash:("a53a02b997935fd8eedcb5f7abab9b9f" OR "e96a73c7bf33a464c510ede582318bf2") OR winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*IMPHASH\=a53a02b997935fd8eedcb5f7abab9b9f* OR *IMPHASH\=e96a73c7bf33a464c510ede582318bf2*)) OR (process.command_line:*.exe\ \-S AND process.parent.executable:*\\services.exe)) AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\clussvc.exe)))
author: Florian Roth
